## TOnPlotAttached type

Listener for plot attach to chart.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TOnPlotAttached<TRenderer extends TUnknownRenderer> = TListener<"onPlotAttached", [IChartComponent<TRenderer>]>;
```
